Text: PLEASE>>Don't seed and run. I have litlle hard drive space to spare so will seed for only 2 weeks.

Seed vanished with only 250 megs to go.  PLEASE come back online and let us finish!!!

I'm getting tired of getting all but a few megs of a large movie file and then the seeds all go away.  I'f you're going to share a movie like this PLEASE stay online and share it.
